lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Your Jan. 14 front-page article on the unusually mild weather in the East and stormy weather in the West ignores the possibility that global warming might be contributing to these events. Surely, that omission reflects our social climate: we seem determined to avoid any mention of dangers to our planetary future. MICHAEL PERLMAN Williamsburg, Mass., Jan. 14, 1995 The writer teaches environmental philosophy at Vermont College.

headline.main: Let Those Who Live in Flood Zones Bear Cost; Global Warming?
